dict.acceptation: 原谅； 饶恕； 对不起；请原谅 ；

sent.orig: If you forgive men their trespasses,your Heavenly Father will also forgive you.
sent.trans: 如果你们饶恕他们的过失，你们的天父也必将饶恕你们的过失。

sent.orig: And forgive us our trespasses, as we forgive those trespass against us.
sent.trans: 求你宽恕我们的罪过，如同我们宽恕别人一样。

sent.orig: "You may be willing to forgive me, but I can't forgive myself."
sent.trans: “你肯原谅我，我不能饶恕我自己。”

sent.orig: Father, give me bread for this day and forgive me even as I forgive my wife.
sent.trans: 父阿，将今天的食物赐给我，赦免我，正如我赦免我的妻子。

sent.orig: And forgive us our debts, as we forgive our debtors.
sent.trans: 12免我们的债，如同我们免了人的债。
